document.full_text: three kenyans appeared at the international criminal court thursday, denying they had any connection with unrest in which 1,200 people were killed after disputed elections in 2007.
document.title: kenyan leaders appear at hague court over killings
lines_and_colors: three kenyans appeared at the international criminal court thursday, denying they had any connection with unrest in which 1,200 people were killed after disputed elections in 2007.
